translation: In the production of the effect and the cause, Nature (matter) is said to be the cause; in the experience of pleasure and pain, the soul is said to be the one responsible.
commentary: 13.21 in the production of the effect? and the cause? Hetuḥ the cause? Prakriti: Prakriti? is said is said (to be)? Purusha: Purusha? of pleasure and pain? as a consumer in the experience? Hetuḥ the cause? Ucyate is said (to be).Commentary Pleasure and pain are the fruits of virtuous and vicious actions.
